comments.comment: Interestingly enough, at 30:14 he mentions that there is "one piece missing" to the Standard Model, The Higgs Boson, also known as the "God Particle". Same year this video was made, 2012, they discovered it!  Researchers found a "new particle with a mass of 125 GeV was discovered in 2012 and later confirmed to be the Higgs boson with more precise measurements". Thank You Science!
